info.name: TEST: API Fundamentals Student Expert
info.description:
This Collection is used [t](https://github.com/Postman-Student-Program/postman-submission-checker-api)o test API Fundamentals Student Expert submissions before issuing a badge

## Updating tests

If the tests need to be changed, edit in the Tests tab and Save.

**IMPORTANT** In order for the changes to be applied to the API, the JSON URL data must be updated:

`Collection folder > Share collection > Via JSON link > Update Link`

## Dummy data

for testing pass/fail cases locally when editing tests, select the `test a claim` environment and use either collection link below for the `COLLECTION_JSON_URL`
